list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a machine or device for mixing things, especially an electrical appliance for mixing foods.
a person considered in terms of their ability to mix socially with others.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: media people need to be good mixers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Media People cần phải là máy trộn tốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a soft drink that can be mixed with alcohol.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: use low-calorie mixers in your cocktails
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sử dụng máy trộn calo thấp trong cocktail của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in sound recording and cinematography) a device for merging input signals to produce a combined output in the form of sound or pictures.
